topic.title: Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional - conformance rules

section.p: Known Subclasses: Hospital Discharge Medications Section

lines.i: The Hospital Discharge Medications section defines the medications that the patient is intended to take (or stop) after discharge. The currently active medications must be listed. The section may also include a patient's prescription history and indicate the source of the medication list, for example, from a pharmacy system versus from the patient.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10396 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15359)/@code="10183-2" HOSPITAL DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15360)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry (CONF:7883)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Discharge Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15359)/@code="10183-2" HOSPITAL DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15360)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry (CONF:7883)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Discharge Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35)
